coverageRegion.describes: Region of coverage of this datasource

projection.describes: Geometric projection used in describing the coordinates

id.describes: id of the cluster in the resouce server

incidentLocation.describes: location where the incident has occured

incident.describes: Description of the incident that has occured

incidentDescription.describes: Description of the incident that has occured

incidentStart.describes: Name of the road from where the incident has started

incidentEnd.describes: Name of the road from where the incident has ended

incidentRoadName.describes: Name of the road where the incident has occured

incidentVector.describes: Google Polyline encoded vector of the incident
